reference: Kennan, J. (1985) “The Duration of Contract strikes in U.S. Manufacturing”, Journal of Econometrics, 28, 5-28.
description:
Description
a cross-section from 1968 to 1976
number of observations :  566
country :  United States
title: Strikes Duration

parameters.dur: duration of the strike in days
parameters.gdp: measure of stage of business cycle (deviation of monthly log industrial production in manufacturing from prediction from OLS on time, time-squared and monthly dummies)
